comments:
I'm not sure how to reproduce this.  I installed a new copy of Eclipse, opened 
a Java perspective, and opened a Debug perspective, opened a Java Browsing 
perspective, and then opened a CVS perspective.

Fixed in RunToLine#init(IWorkbenchWindow).
Check other action hierarchies as well to ensure not assuming have active page 
at this point.
*** Bug 14901 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
